column1: #Text=" Aang says : " That answer your question ?
#Text=" Katara says : " That was n't as bad as I thought .
#Text=What are you kids doing out past curfew ?
#Text=We were just on our way home .
#Text=" Guard one says : " Wait , what 's the matter with him ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Uh , he has pentapox , sir .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh , it 's so awful .
#Text=" Guard two says : " Hey , I think I heard of pentapox !
#Text=Did n't your cousin Chang die of it ?
#Text=" Guard one says : " We 'd better go wash our hands , and burn our clothes .
#Text=" Aang says : " Thank you , sewer friends .
